rules_text: Create a token copy of target creature in your graveyard, except it has haste and is a Phoenix in addition to its other types. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: [i]“Before a life born many, many times, there is darkness. After a death died many, many times, there is shade. As I don't know death, I have surpassed that darkness.”[/i]
